name: Simple Dark Theme for Flight Rising
description: A simple dark theme for Flight Rising, as the default interface is very bright and hard on the eyes. Works across the whole site, even the forums and coliseum. ***NOTICE*** In order to get the usernames to display in the forums as in this theme, please download and install the free font "AR Cena", then restart your browser. You can get it >> HERE << from FontZone.
additional_info: Just to note: the only thing this CSS does is change the color of the site and associated images. Nothing is traced, stored, or collected. Use Stylus and not Stylish! The "Known Issues" are listed beneath the "Release Notes"; be sure to check that out if you are experiencing problems; I try my best to fix the things that I can. If you notice any issues or know how to code something that I don't, please contact me. ^^ Be aware that the unoptimized site pages (the ones that do not start with www1) are difficult to adjust. There are also some images/sections that I simply couldn't manage to change. I am constantly updating this, so be sure to check back often! === RELEASE NOTES === • 11/7/2020 - Increased the max height for the bio and bio edit areas • 10/22/2020 - Darkened updated hoard/vault • 6/24/2020 - Reupdated dragon profiles for the new update. However, the site changed the way that the scenes were rendered, so now there is no way to leave the Scenes visible with how the default ones have a white background. Until they change this (they probably never will), Scenes will have to stay hidden, which is a huge shame. (You can try to suggest to the staff to redo the default scenes so that the backgrounds aren't white) • 6/8-9/2020 - Finished updating the new dragon profiles (also made a style that removes the Like buttons on profiles, you can find it here). Also recolored a few other elements across the site. • 2/19/2020 - Recolored Fantastic Familiars • 2/6/2020 - Updated Familiar bonding dialog colors • 2/1/2020 - Finally darkened and adjusted "Lucky Streak" text in Fairgrounds (Also added compatibility colors for item count styles) • 12/14/19 - Recolored Swap Catalog • 12/4/19 - Updated dev tracker and recolored the database • 10/23/19 - Recolored dev tracker • 10/18/19 - Recolored updated auction house gene selectors • 10/10/19 - Darkened updated bestiary • 10/2/19 - Recolored Paginations (market and vault are a bit odd, but can't do more unless they get moved to the www1 side of the site.) • 9/5/19 - Tweaked the Site Status box for the new formatting there • 8/21/19 - Darkened tab description boxes • 7/26/19 - Darkened sections of the Dressing Room and Morphology for a site update • 6/21/19 - Darkened Assay Bloodlines previews • 6/9/19 - Darkened Dragon Search • 5/31/19 - Darkened avatar background in account settings and "show older quotes" box • 5/20/19 - Adjusted new Trading Post, Galore, and item tooltips (though the tooltips that are on the non-www1 side of the site aren't displaying the bg images) • 5/1/19 - Darkened the font color on the Morphology pages • 4/21/19 - Whitened the clock time on non-www1 pages to fix a site update • 3/10/19 - Darkened areas on the Purchase Gems and friends pages, as well as a few other things • 2/19/19 - Adjusted some colors to accommodate the recent update, as well as darkened the Marketplace • 2/10/19 - Made the energy bars slightly smaller and elements slightly easier to see • 2/9/19 - Darkened the boxes on the home page and crossroads filter • 2/7/19 - Changed the new Lair and Hibernal Den to darker colors • 1/31/19 - Updated the Emoji interface to be darker • 1/26/19 - Updated the Gathering page interface to be darker • 12/5/18 - Updated some interface colors, both for unmentioned FR site updates and to make some buttons slightly easier to see. • 9/19/18 - Changed the colors of the new Baldwin pagination, as well as adding a dark bg to dragon's names for lair sorting • 9/12/18 - Changed some colors of the dressing room area • 8/31/18 - Changed the colors of the Set Forum Vista section, and fixed an error in the Bestiary • 8/27/18 - Fixed an error I made on the nesting grounds from the previous update • 8/26/18 - Finally fixed the Bestiary, Festive Favors, and Crim's Collection Cart, making the latter two readable • 8/22/18 - Fixed the colors for Roundsey's Raffle Roulette • 8/9/18 - Tweaked a few small things, and adjusted the colors of the HRs for the breadcrumbs and Alerts pages • 5/25/18 - Fixed the colors on the Cookies banner • 5/20/18 - Fixed item-rarity backdrops, small adjustments to forum search, and added borders to pop-up boxes • 5/3/18 - Changed the background image across the site to be dark, removing the white flash when loading • 5/1/18 - Camping pop-up now has a dark background to reduce eyestrain when solving the captcha • 3/19/18 - Updated the Dressing Room and Support pages, and Clan Bio editing area. • 3/15/18 - Darkened the dialogue boxes for most of the Trading Post and recolored the login/signup area • 3/12/18 - Updated the Coliseum, sidebar hubs, exalted, and the "Who's Online" pages • 3/3/18 - Replaced more of the graphics and changed some of the text colors. • 3/1/18 - Fixed the graphics for the Gather Items and Initiate New Trade pages, and various other things • 2/14/18 - Fixed the forums, since they were updated • 12/29/17 - Fixed the colors on the Encyclopedia and Support pages • 11/26/17 - Fixed the colors on the Festive Favors pages •11/24/17 - Fixed some of the colors in the Auction House • 11/17/17 - Fixed many more things • 11/8/17 - Fixed many of the colors and images across the site • 11/1/17 - Initial Release • Known Issues (that I don't know how to or cannot fix; many apologies for this inconvenience) - Scenes are currently disabled since the default scene is bright white and unable to be removed while keeping the other scenes visible - Current Vista preview on dragon profiles in edit mode show a white backdrop if left as none (does not affect the actual profile, though) - The correct/incorrect answers are not showing up as the intended green/red in Tomo's Trivia Tablet - The fog/clouds on the main page of the coliseum look a bit odd, due to the non-white background color - Some of the font colors are not showing up correctly in certain areas - The notification alerts are Orange instead of Blue on all unoptimized pages (ones that do not start with www1.) - The replaced images are only tested on Chromium-based browsers and don't work on Firefox
